About.title: A little about me...
About.description-1: I'm a 23-year-old developer, mainly focused on front-end, but recently I've been diving a lot into back-end. I love understanding projects end-to-end and creating solutions that not only look good but also work smoothly and efficiently, always aiming to grow as a full-stack developer.
About.description-2: I consider myself calm and creative, which helps me tackle challenges, learn new things, and experiment with different technologies. Whether it's a new framework or a programming concept, I'm excited to expand my horizons â€” that's what motivates me as a developer.
About.description-3: Outside of the code editor, you'll probably find me gaming, listening to music, or reading a book. These hobbies help me relax and are part of who I am, often influencing how I approach design and problem-solving.
